mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T2_RENT_CAR_TBL R INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON C.C_KIND = R.RENT_KIND LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) R_CNT, PRODUCT_NO, STATE FROM T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL WHERE PRODUCT_KIND = 'RENT' GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = R.RENT_NO WHERE R_DELYN = 'N' AND U_ID = #{uId} ORDER BY R.RENT_NO DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{lastNum}
SELECT * FROM T2_RENT_CAR_TBL R INNER JOIN T2_CODE_TYPE C ON R.RENT_KIND = C.C_KIND WHERE R.RENT_NO = #{rentNo} AND R_DELYN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE T2_RENT_CAR_TBL SET R_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE RENT_NO = #{rentNo}
UPDATE T2_RENT_IMG_TBL SET IMG_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE RENT_NO = #{rentNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{rentNo} AND PRODUCT_KIND = 'RENT'
mapper.update: UPDATE T2_RENT_CAR_TBL SET RENT_NAME = #{rentName}, RENT_KIND = #{rentKind}, RENT_PRICE = #{rentPrice}, RENT_SALES = #{rentSales}, R_ZIPNO = #{rZipno}, R_ADDR = #{rAddr}, R_DETAIL_ADDR = #{rDetailAddr}, R_UPDATE_TIME = now(), R_RESIDUE = #{rResidue} WHERE RENT_NO = #{rentNo}
UPDATE T2_RENT_IMG_TBL SET IMG_NAME = #{imgName}, IMG_SAVE_NAME = #{imgSaveName}, IMG_PATH = #{imgPath}, IMG_DATE = now() WHERE IMG_NO = #{imgNo}
